author: Deleted User
content: How long do we have for mining ETH? There are some speculations that PoW to PoS might happen late into 2023, is that true, if not, then when is the end of ETH mining?

author: Deleted User
content: I heard today that in August 2021 ETH mining will become useless after the PoW to PoS merger.

author: Deleted User
content: Antminer E9 is shipping out in July, and August seems to be the end of mining? Could someone explain, please?

author: sky.cactus
content: Unofficial estimate from random person on the internet: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/598292067260825641/841806358130851840

author: trent_vanepps
content:
2023 is wildly pessimistic, that must be an old assumption people have not updated. 

the most optimistic takes I've seen are October 2021, the more conservative are for Q1 2022. you should prepare for mining to end in 6-9 months if you are currently mining

author: trent_vanepps
content: where did you hear this, can i get a link and jump in?

author: treyzania
content: you have to remember that any miner that bitmain sells they've already been mining on for some time

author: treyzania
content: at that point they're just liquidating their inventory before the value of miners drops too much to make it worth selling because the merger is coming

author: treyzania
content: but no the merger is probably Q4
